SA01n787:635: kathaṃ sāmiṣaṃ kati sāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ sāmiṣaparīkṣā |

SA01n787:639: kathaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kati nirāmiṣāṇi kimarthaṃ nirāmiṣaparīkṣā |

SA01n787:647: kathaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ kati naiṣkramyāśritāni kimarthaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaparīkṣā |
SA01n787:651: kathaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ kati saṃskṛtāni kimarthaṃ saṃskṛtaparīkṣā yasyotpā do'pi prajñāyate vyayo'pi sthityanyathātvamapi tatsarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam |

SA01n787:694: kathaṃ grāhyaṃ kati grāhyāni kimarthaṃ grāhyaparīkṣā |

SA01n787:718: utpannaniruddha lakṣaṇato'pi hetuphalopayo gato'pi saṃkleśavyavadānakāritra samatikrāntito'pi hetuparigrahavināśato'pi phalasvalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvatā'pi smarasaṃkalpanimittatohapi apekṣāsaṃkleśanimittato'pi upekṣāvyavadānanimittato'pi atitaṃ draṣṭavyam sarveṣāmekedaśaḥ |

SA01n787:730: kathaṃ kuśalaṃ kati kuśalāni kimarthaṃ kuśalaparīkṣā |
SA01n787:731: svabhāvato'pi sambandhato'pi anubandhato'pi utthānato'pi paramārthato'pi upapattilābhato'pi prayogato'pi puraskārato'pi anugrahato'pi parigrahato'pi pratipakṣato'pyupaśamato'pi niṣyandato'pi kuśalaṃ draṣṭavyam |

SA01n787:734: svabhāvataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat śraddhādaya ekādaśa caitasikā dharmāḥ ||

SA01n787:745: yathā teṣveva prakṛtyā apratisaṃkhyāya rūciḥ saṃtiṣṭhate ||
SA01n787:747: satpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamya saddharmaśravaṇaṃ yoniśo manaskāraṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiṃ kuśalasya bhāvanā ||
SA01n787:749: yattathāgataṃ vā puraskṛtya caitye vā pustagate vā citragate dharmaṃ vā puraskṛtya dharmādhiṣṭhāni pustake pūjākarma ||
SA01n787:753: yaddānamayena puṇyakriyāvastunā vā śīlamayena vā svargopapattiparigraho vā āḍhyo kulopapattiparigraho vā vyavadānānukūlyaparigraho vā pratipakṣataḥ kuśalaṃ katamat |

SA01n787:758: upaśamaprāptasya tadādhipatyena vaiśeṣikā guṇā abhijñādayo laukikalokottarāḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāḥ ||
SA01n787:760: svabhāvato'pi saṃbandhato'pi anubandhato'pi utthānato'pi paramārthato'pi upapattilābhato'pi prayogato'pi puraskārato'pi upaghātato'pi parigrahato'pi vipakṣato'pi paripanthato'pyakuśalaṃ draṣṭavyam |

SA01n787:777: yathāpi tadanyatamānyatamaṃ devanikāyasanniśrayaṃ puraskṛtya hiṃsāpūrvakaṃ vā kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ vā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati tatra vā pūjākarma prayojayati yatra mahān janakāyo'puṇyena yujyate |

SA01n787:790: aṣṭau rūpīṇi dhātvāyatanāni sasaṃprayogaṃ manojīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgo nāma kāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāśca ||

SA01n787:821: catvāro dhātavo dvecāyatane tadanyeṣāṃ ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmekadeśaḥ |

SA01n787:876: skaṃdhānāṃ daśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ caturṇāṃ cāyatanānāṃ pradeśaḥ |

SA01n787:922: nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanānupūrvyā ca sattvānabhinirvarttayati pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya ||
SA01n787:926: yā cāvidyā yā ca tṛṣṇā yaccopādānamityayaṃ saṃkleśasaṃgrahaḥ |

SA01n787:993: pūrvabhāvitānāṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭatarā puṣṭatamā pravṛttiḥ ||

SA01n787:1005: pratiṣṭhādhipatīto'pyāvedhādhipatito'pi sahabhāvādhipa tito'pi viṣayādhipatito'pi prasavādhipatito'pi sthānādhipatito'pi phalopabhogādhipatito'pi laukikaviśuddhya dhipatito'pi lokottaraviśuddhya dhipatito'pi adhipati pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:1006: kathaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaṃ kati sabhāgatatsabhāgāni kimarthaṃ sabhāgatatsabhāgaparīkṣā |
SA01n787:1015: viṣayagrahaṇādhipatito'pi kuśalaprabandhādhipatito'pi nikāyasabhāgasthānadhipatito'pi śubhāśubhakarmaphalabhogādhipatito'pi laukikavairāgyādhiopatito'pi lokottaravairāgyādhipatito'pi indriyaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA01n787:1016: vedanāskandho vijñānaskandha rūpasaṃskāraskandhaikadeśaḥ dvādaśa dhātavaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni dharmadhātvāyatanaikadeśaśca |
SA01n787:1018: kathaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā kati duḥkhaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāparīkṣā |
SA01n787:1022: kathaṃ viparīṇāmaduḥkhatā kati viparīṇāmaduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāparīkṣā |
SA01n787:1026: kathaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatā kati saṃskāraduḥkhatāni kimarthaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāparīkṣā |
SA01n787:1027: aduḥkhāsukhavedanā svalakṣaṇato'pi aduḥkhāsukha vedanīyasvadharmalakṣaṇato'pi tadubhayadauṣṭhulyaparigrahato'pi dvayāvinirmokṣānityānubandhāyogakṣemato'pi saṃskāraduḥkhatā draṣṭavyā |
SA01n787:1028: skandhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayorekadeśaṃ sthāpayitvā sarvāṇi |
SA01n787:1030: kathaṃ savipākaṃ kati savipākāni kimarthaṃ savipākaparīkṣā |
SA01n787:1037: pariṇatito'pi pāriṇāmikaḥ viṣayato'pi vaiṣayikaḥ āśayato 'pyāśi (? śayi)
SA01n787:1041: api khalvāhāro 'śuddhā śrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ śuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ sthitisāṃdarśinakaśca draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:1042: kathaṃ sottaraṃ kati sottarāṇi kimarthaṃ sottaraparīkṣā |
SA01n787:1054: skandhadhātvāyataneṣvātmeti vā sattvo jīvo jantuḥ poṣo pugdalo manujo mānava iti vā yatparikalpyate ||
SA01n787:1064: teṣāmevaskandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ dravyamantaḥ prajñaptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamantaḥ rūpiṇo'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādi yathānirddiṣṭaḥ ||
SA01n787:1077: api khalu ṣaḍvidhaḥ prabhedaḥ eṣāmeva skandhadhātvāyatananām |
SA01n787:1078: bahirmukhaprabhedaḥ antarmukhaprabhedaḥ āyata kālabhedaḥ paricchinnakālaprabhedaḥ tatkālaprabhedaḥ saṃdarśanaprabhedaśca |
SA01n787:1086: śaikṣāṇāṃ sthāpayitvā caramakṣaṇe skandhadhātvāyatanāni tadanyāni aśaikṣāṇām ||
SA01n787:1090: buddhānāṃ pāramiprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca sanidarśanāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni ||0 ||
SA01n787:1094: lakṣaṇasaṃgrahaḥ dhātusaṃgrahaḥ jātisaṃgrahaḥ avasthāsaṃgrahaḥ sahāyasaṃgrahaḥ deśasaṃgrahaḥ kālasaṃgrahaḥ ekadeśasaṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgrahaḥ itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ paramārthasaṃgrahaśca ||
SA01n787:1107: evaṃ tadanye skandhā dhātava āyatanāni ca |
SA01n787:1115: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśa saṃgraho veditavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:1117: yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:1118: itaretarasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ rūpaskandhasaṃgrahe kati dhātavaḥ katyāyatanāni |
SA01n787:1141: tadvat tadanye dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanairnirdṛśyante anye ca na skandhadhātvāyatanairnirddiśyante |
SA01n787:1142: yathā dravyamantaḥ prajñāptimantaḥ saṃvṛtimantaḥ paramārthamanto jñeyā vijñeyā abhijñeyā rūpiṇo'rūpiṇaḥ sanidarśanā anidarśanā ityevamādayaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdṛṣṭāḥ |
SA01n787:1147: yathā yathā ālambaneṣu cittābhisaṃkṣepaḥ tathā tathā kuśalamūlābhivṛddhiḥ ||0 ||
SA01n787:1151: avinirbhāga saṃprayogaḥ miśrībhāva saṃprayogaḥ samavadhānasaṃprayogaḥ sahabhāvasaṃprayogaḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānasaṃprayogaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaśca ||
SA01n787:1155: paramāṇorūrdhvaṃ sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ rūpāṃśikānāṃ parasparaṃ miśrībhāvaḥ ||
SA01n787:1159: ekasmin kāye skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sahakālapravṛttiḥ samamutpatti sthitinirodhāḥ |
SA01n787:1171: api khalu kliṣṭasarvatragaḥ saṃprayogo manasi caturṇṇāṃ kleśānām ||
SA01n787:1172: kādācitkaḥ saṃprayogastadyathā citte śraddhādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ca kleśopakleśānām ||
SA01n787:1173: āvasthikaḥ saṃprayogaḥ sukhāyā vedanāyāḥ sasaṃprayogā yāḥ |
SA01n787:1177: bahirmukhaḥ saṃprayogo yabhdūyasā kāma pratisaṃyuktānāṃ cittacaitasikānām ||
SA01n787:1179: ucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ pārthagja nikānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇām ||
SA01n787:1180: anucitaḥ saṃprayogaḥ lokottarāṇāṃ cittacaitasikānāmādyataduttarāṇāṃ lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhānāṃ ca ||
SA01n787:1182: cittamātre vedanādīnāṃ sāṃkleśikānāṃ vyāvadānikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ saṃprayogaṃ jānāti |
SA01n787:1183: tacca jānanātmā vedayate saṃjānāti cetayate smarati saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate cetayatya bhiniveśaṃ prajahāti nai rātmyamavatarati ||
SA01n787:1190: kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmaprati saṃyuktaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktaiśca kleśopakleśairvījasamancāgamena samancāgataḥ upapattiprātilābhikaiśca ||
SA01n787:1192: rūpadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktaiḥ klaiśopakleśaiḥ vījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ |
SA01n787:1197: traidhātu kapratipakṣa lābhī yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpannastasya bījasamanvāgamenāsamanvāgataḥ |
SA01n787:1200: pra......... dharmāṇāṃ vaśitāsamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ laukikānāṃ lokottarāṇāṃ vā dhyānā.............samādhisamāpattyādīnāṃ tadekatyājāṃ(cā)
SA01n787:1203: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ yo ya eva dharmaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kuśalo vā akuśalo vā avyākṛto vā tasya samudācārasamanvāgamena samanvāgataḥ ||
SA01n787:1204: samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bījasamanvāgamena samanvāgato'samanvāgataśca vaktavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:1209: tathā ācayāpacayajño na kasyāṃ cillaukikyāṃ saṃpattau vipattau vā ekāntikasaṃjñī bhavati yāvadevānunayapratighaprahāṇāya ||
SA01n787:1219: narakasattvajanmatiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu pūrvavideheṣvapagodānīyeṣu jāmbūdvīpeṣu uttareṣu kuruṣu deveṣu caturmā(hā)
SA01n787:1220: rājakāyikeṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu brahmapurohiteṣu mahābrāhmeṣuparīttābheṣva (pramāṇābheṣu ābhāsvareṣu parīttaśubheṣva)
SA01n787:1221: pramāṇaśubheṣu śubhakṛtsneṣvanabhrakeṣu puṇyaprasaveṣu vṛhatphaleṣva saṃjñisattveṣvabṛheṣvatapeṣu sugdaśeṣu sudarśaneṣvakaniṣṭheṣvākāśānantyāyataneṣu vijñānānantyāyataneṣvākiñcanyāyataneṣu naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu ||
SA01n787:1226: pṛthivīmaṇḍale sumeruḥ saptakāñcanaparvatāḥ catvāro dvīpāḥ aṣṭāvantaradvīpāḥ abhyantaraḥ samudro vāhyasamudraścatasraḥ sumerupariṣaṇḍāḥ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ vāpastriṃśānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi cakracāḍaḥ parvataḥ ākāśe vimānāni yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca asurāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi nārakāṇāṃ sthānāntarāṇi |
SA01n787:1227: uṣṇanarakāḥ śītanarakāḥ pratyekanarakāśca tadekatyānāṃ ca tiryakpretānāṃ sthānāntarāṇi yāvadādityāḥ paricaranto diśo'vabhāsayante vairocanāstāvatsāhasrake loke sahasraṃ candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryaṇāṃ sahasraṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājāṇāṃ sahasraṃ caturṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ sahasraṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ sahasraṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sahasraṃ yāmānāṃ sahasraṃ tuṣitānāṃ sahasraṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ sahasraṃ paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ sahasraṃ brahmalaukikānāmidamucyate sahasracūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ||
SA01n787:1228: sahasraṃ sahasracūḍikānāṃ dhātūnāmucyate dvitīyo madhyamasāhasro lokadhātuḥ ||
SA01n787:1230: evaṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ mahācakravāḍa parvatamaṇḍala pariveṣṭitaḥ |
SA01n787:1232: tathā ca devaḥ cakrākārān vṛṣṭivindūn nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mākāśād varṣati |
SA01n787:1233: tathā ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirantaraṃ niravacchinna mapramāṇo lokadhātuḥ saṃvarttiṣyate vā vivarttiṣyate vā saṃvarttate vā saṃvṛttastiṣṭhati vā vivarttate vā vivṛttastiṣṭhati vā |
SA01n787:1234: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathā sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu |
SA01n787:1235: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśaḥ janitaḥ karmakleśādhipateyaśca sarvamucyate duḥkhasatyam |
SA01n787:1236: pariśuddhalokadhātustu na duḥkhasatyasaṃgṛhīḥto na karmakleśa janitaḥ na karmakleśādhipateyaśca |
SA01n787:1237: kevalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānena vyavadānakuśalamūlādhipatinā ākṛṣyate tadutpattisthānaṃ cācintyaṃ kevalaṃ buddhena budhyate na dhyāyināṃ dhyānagocaraḥ kiṃ punaḥ cintayatām ||
SA01n787:1239: “jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā du.........tyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadā......duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham“ ||
SA01n787:1257: saṃvādhaduḥkhaṃ vipariṇati duḥkhaṃ saṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ viprayogaduḥkhaṃ kāmyaphalābhāvaduḥkhaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:1262: tatra kathaṃ tisṛṣu saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ |
SA01n787:1264: jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā |
SA01n787:1265: priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ tadvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā |
SA01n787:1268: tat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ paramārthasatyena duḥkhaṃ ca |
SA01n787:1269: katamat saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkhaṃ katamat paramārthasatyena duḥkham |
SA01n787:1270: jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvat yadapīcchann labhate tadapi duḥkhamiti saṃvṛtisatyena duḥkham |
SA01n787:1271: yaduktaṃ saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paramārthasatyena duḥkham ||
SA01n787:1276: asallakṣaṇaṃ vināśalakṣaṇaṃ vipariṇatilakṣaṇaṃ viyogalakṣaṇaṃ sannihitalakṣaṇaṃ dharmatālakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prabandhalakṣaṇaṃ vyādhyādi lakṣaṇaṃ cittacittākāravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ bhogasaṃpattirvipatti lakṣaṇaṃ bhājanalokasaṃvarttavivarttalakṣaṇam ||
SA01n787:1300: kadācit sārāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati kadācid vītarāgaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati |
SA01n787:1301: yadvat sadveṣaṃ vā vītadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vā vītamohaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā vihisāṃ vā nimnaṃ vā unnataṃ vā uddhataṃ vā anuddhataṃ vā upaśāntaṃ vā anupaśāntaṃ vā samāhita vā asamāhitaṃ vā |
SA01n787:1307: tisṛṇāṃ saṃvarttarnānāṃ śīrṣāṇi dvitīya tṛtīya caturthadhyānāni |
SA01n787:1308: caturthadhyāne vāhyānāṃ vimānānāṃ tu vāhyābhāvat eva saṃvarttavivarttaḥ |
SA01n787:1309: kevalaṃ tairdevaiḥ tāni vimānāni saha nirvarttante saha nirudhyante etaducyate saṃvartta vivarttaḥ ||
SA01n787:1321: sattvā āyuḥkṣayād vā puṇya kṣayād vā karmakṣayād vā tasmādadhiṣṭhānāt cyavante iti |
SA01n787:1331: tisro duḥkhatāḥ aṣṭākā vā duḥkhaṃ ṣaḍākāra vā duḥkhaṃ bāhulyena pūrvamuktaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ nāma |
SA01n787:1332: kiṃ pratītyasūtre uktaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti |
SA01n787:1337: tathā ca saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mayā yatkiṃcid veditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti ||
SA01n787:1338: api khalu utpādavyayadharmadvayānugateṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādayo'ṣṭau duḥkhāni |
SA01n787:1339: prajñāyante ityabhisaṃdhāya buddhena bhāṣitaṃ yadanityaṃ tad duḥkhamiti |
SA01n787:1340: api ca anityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ prajñāyate iti anityato duḥkhaṃ na sarve saṃskārā ityatrādhisandhirveditavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:1353: tacca ātmano nāstitā anātmano'stitā satī śūnyatā ||
SA01n787:1364: etadabhisaṃghāyoktaṃ bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti ||
SA01n787:1365: api coktaṃ bhagavatā naitat sarvaṃ mama naiṣo'hamasmi na me sa ātmā iti |
SA01n787:1366: evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajñāya draṣṭhavyam iti tasya ko'rtha uktaḥ |
SA01n787:1375: yathā cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatā tathā rūpādīnāmapi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā |
SA01n787:1376: cittopāttatāmupādāya cittaikayogakṣematāmupādāya cittavikāratadvikāratāmupādāya cittāśrayatāmudāpādāya cittādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya cittvaśavarttināṃ copādāya ||
SA01n787:1377: api khalu atyantavikāropālabdhitāmupādāya utpannasya cānapekṣya pratyayaṃ svarasavināśitāmupādāya rūpasyāpi kṣaṇikatā draṣṭavyā ||
SA01n787:1378: yaduktaṃ yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvantaccatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri ca .......tātyupādāyeti |
SA01n787:1382: yatra punaḥ samudāye yadbhūtamupalabhyate tattatrā stiti vaktavya |
SA01n787:1385: upādāyarūpe'pi yadupādāyarūpaṃ yasmin samudāya upalabhyate tattatrāstīti veditavyam ||
SA01n787:1386: yatpunarūcyate paramāṇusaṃcitto rūpa samudāya iti tatra niḥśarīraḥ paramāṇurveditavyaḥ |
SA01n787:1387: buddhyā paryantaprabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāvibhāghanatāmupādāya rūpe dravyāḥ pariniṣpattipraveśatāṃ copādāya ||
SA01n787:1388: tat punaretad duḥkhamasti vipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitaṃ saṃlikhitā saṃlikhitaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:1389: asti madhyamasaṃlikhitam asti tanukamasaṃlikhitam asti tanuttaraṃ saṃlikhitam asti tanutamaṃ saṃlikhitam astyaduḥkhaṃ duḥkhapratibhāsaṃ mahāsaṃlekhapratyupasthānaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:1411: paṭuka eva cittaprakāre svākuśalamulabalādhā nato vā paropasaṃhārato vā akuśalacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam ||
SA01n787:1412: paṭuke vā cittaprakāre apaṭuke vā tadubhayavai kalyādabhisaṃskārāsamarthasya vā avyākṛtacittasya maraṇaṃ draṣṭavyam ||
SA01n787:1416: tadyathā kṛṣṇasya kutapasya nirbhāso'ndhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ ||
SA01n787:1417: aśubhakāriṇastadyathā śuklasya parasya nirbhāsajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ |
SA01n787:1426: upapattyāyatane tulāvanāmonnāmayogena cyavate pratisandhi ca vadhnāti |
SA01n787:1430: sa ca vipākastata ūrdhvamindriyābhinrivṛttiḥ yathā pratityasamutpāde catṛsṛṣvāyoniṣu |
SA01n787:1436: bhagavatā tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī samudayasatyanirdeśena nirdiṣṭā ||
SA01n787:1440: tatha hi tṛṣṇā vastusarvatragā avasthāsarvatragā adhvasarvatragā dhātusarvatragā eṣaṇā sarvatragā prakārasarvatragā ca keśaḥ katamaḥ |

SA01n787:1542: īrṣyāsaṃyojanena saṃprayukto lābhasatkārān anunayati dharmaṃ na gurukaroti |
SA01n787:1547: mātsaryasaṃyojanena saṃprayukta upacayamanunayati ta dvarjanatāṃ ca na satkaroti |
SA01n787:1555: apica rāgadveṣamohānniśritya kuśalasamudācāreṣu na vaśavarttitāṃ labhate |

SA01n787:1575: te sattvā hīnapratipakṣaṃ labhante mado mānaścotpadyate āryasatyeṣu saṃmohaśca |
SA01n787:1576: mithyāmokṣaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ ca saṃtorayanti buddhaśāsanadharmavinayeṣu vimatiḥ vicikitsā ca ||
SA01n787:1579: kleśān sthāpayitvā tadanyaḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvaścaitasiko dharmaḥ |

SA01n787:1615: ātmavādopādāne tu tīrthyā anyo'nyaṃ na vivadanti |

SA01n787:1638: tat saṃprajānabdiḥ sabrahmacāribhirgrāme vā araṇye vā tathā kurvantaṃ paśyabhdirucyate ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmān karotyevaṃ kṛtyaṃ caratyevamācaritaṃ grāmakaṇṭaka āmiṣo'śuciḥ |
SA01n787:1642: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya dīrghakālaṃ punaḥ punarjātimaraṇeṣu vilaśyante ityucyante nighāḥ ||
SA01n787:1645: rāgadveṣamohānniśritya bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā adhyeṣaṇāsamutpādena prabandhānupacchedena buddhe dharme saṃghe duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgeṣu vā vicikitsāsamutpādena vā śalyā nāma ||

SA01n787:1668: abhāve vighāte sarvadā dāridya duḥkhādibhiḥ kliṣṭā bhavantīti vighātāḥ |
SA01n787:1672: tena nimittānuvyañjanābhiniveśena kāyaṃ cittaṃ ca paridahantīti paridāhāḥ ||
SA01n787:1679: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa śastrādānadaṇḍādibhiḥ raṇayanti nānāvidhaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantīti rāgādayo raṇā ucyante ||

SA01n787:1688: rāgadveṣamohasanniśrayeṇa kāyasāpekṣatā vittasāpekṣatā bodhyabhāvaḥ kolāhalaratiḥ parittakuśaladharmalābhe'pi santoṣaḥ |
SA01n787:1692: rāgaḥ pratighaśca dvau kleśau viṣaye dṛṣṭau ca vipratipannau |
SA01n787:1698: daśa kleśā duḥkhe samudaye ca vipratipannāḥ |
SA01n787:1700: punaḥ daśa kleśā nirodhe mārge ca vipratipannāḥ |
SA01n787:1705: api khalu rāgaḥ kāmadhātau sukhasaumanasyopekṣābhi saṃprayujyate |
SA01n787:1714: yathā mānastathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaśca ||
SA01n787:1732: api khalu rāgaḥ pratigho mānaśca kāmadhātau vastvekadeśapravṛttikāḥ |
SA01n787:1733: kāmadhātuvad rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātāvapi śiṣṭāḥ kleśāḥ sarvatra sarvavastu pravṛttikāḥ ||

SA01n787:1744: evaṃ ca darśanaprahātavyakleśanikāyā dvādaśādhikaṃ śataṃ kleśāḥ ||
SA01n787:1746: sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ antaprāhadṛṣṭiḥ rāgaḥ pratigho māno'vidyā ca |
SA01n787:1747: rūpadhātau bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ pañca kleśāḥ sthāpayitvā pratigham |
SA01n787:1760: anutpannasyānutpādata utpannasya varjanato vā pratipakṣa lābhamārgaḥ ||

SA01n787:1802: tanna daśānāmakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ triṣu apāyeṣu |
SA01n787:1805: adhipatiphalaṃ pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vipattiḥ |
SA01n787:1807: daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ vipākaphalaṃ devamanuṣyamatiṣūpapadyamānānāṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vipākaḥ |
SA01n787:1808: niṣyandaphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇa ātmābhāvaparigrahayoḥ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate |
SA01n787:1809: adhipattiphalaṃ tadāyataneṣu pratyekaṃ tadānurūpyeṇaiva vāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃpattirabhinirvarttate |

SA01n787:1816: yena ekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhavanākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā ekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā anekena karmaṇā anekamātmabhāvamākṣipati vā ||

SA01n787:1821: yaduktaṃ sūtre trividhaṃ karma puṇyakarma apuṇya karma āniṃjyakarma ca |
SA01n787:1828: yaduktaṃ sūtre avidyālambanāḥ saṃskārāḥ puṇyāniṃjyā apuṇyāniṃjyāśceti |
SA01n787:1845: yaduktaṃ sūtre sādhāraṇaṃ karma asādhāraṇaṃ karma valavatkarma durvalaṃ karma ca |
SA01n787:1854: yathā sattvānāmānyaiḥ sattvaiḥ saha anyonyaṃ darśanādikaṃ nopabhogo nopalabdhiḥ |
SA01n787:1859: prātipakṣikakarmabalavataḥ sarvaṃ saṃcetanīyaṃ kuśalaṃ karma balavadityucyate |
SA01n787:1860: tatkarma niśrityoktaṃ bhagavatā mamāryaśrāvakā apramāṇavaipulyakarmaṇi cittaṃ kuśalaṃ paribhāvayanti abhisaṃskṛte sapramāṇe karmaṇi nākṣipanti nāvasthāpayanti na parihāpayanti tatsaṃkhyāte |
SA01n787:1861: yadapi pratipakṣadurbalapugdalasya saṃcetanīyamakuśalaṃ karma tadapi kuśalātkarmaṇo balavadityucyate |
SA01n787:1862: yat punaḥ saṃcetanīyaṃ karma niyatavipākamaprahīṇamaparijñātaṃ tad balavat karma ityucyate |
SA01n787:1863: tanmanasi nidhāyoktaṃ sarvaṃ ca kuśalākuśalaṃ karma niyatavipākamāryamārgeṇa prahīṇaṃ balavat karma ityucyate |
SA01n787:1864: yadapi kāmapratisaṃyuktamakuśalaṃ karma yadapi pūrvamabhyastaṃ yadapi padasthaṃ yadapyasādhyamabhisaṃskṛtaṃ karma aparinirvāṇadharmataḥ tadapi prakṛtyā balavat karma ityucyate |
SA01n787:1867: tadyathā kṣetrataḥ vastutaḥ svabhāvataḥ āśrayataḥ manasikārataḥ āśayataḥ sahāyataḥ bahulīkārataḥ bāhujanyataśca ||
SA01n787:1869: bhagavatoktaṃ ya evaṃ vadedyathā'yaṃ puruṣapugdalaḥ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso na bhavatyavakāśaśca na prajñāyate samyag duḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai |
SA01n787:1870: yastvevaṃ vadedyathāyaṃ puruṣapugdalo yathāvedanīyaṃ karma karotyupacinoti tathā tathā yathāvedanīyaṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ sati brahmacaryabhāso bhavatyavakāśaśca prajñāyate samyag duḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai |
SA01n787:1872: tatra buddhā manasyevaṃ mithyāvacanaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ kāmayante |

SA01n787:1942: kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākaṃ karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ karma akṛṣṇaśuklāvipākaṃ vyāmiśraṃ karma ||

SA01n787:2566: śrotāpi sukhamudgṛṇhāti dharmagauravatayā kṣipraṃ bodhi saṃbhārān paripūrayati āśudharmatāṃ pratividhyati |

SA01n787:2572: sūtrāṇāṃ madhye vā ante vā gāthayā yad gīyate |
SA01n787:2581: dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī paṃcapadī ṣaṭpadī vā ||
SA01n787:2607: evaṃ sūtrādīni dvādaśāṅgānyāryaśāsanāni triṣu piṭakeṣu saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti |
SA01n787:2612: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ caitāni pañca śrāvakāṇāṃ piṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti |
SA01n787:2613: nidānamavadānamitivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ caitāni catvāri dvayoḥ piṭakayoḥ saparivāre vinayapiṭake saṃgṛhītāni bhavanti |
SA01n787:2614: vaipulyamabhdutadharmaśca ete dve bodhisattvapiṭakasya sūtrapiṭake saṃgṛhīte bhavataḥ |
SA01n787:2615: upadeśa ekaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvapiṭakayoḥ abhidharmapiṭake saṃgṛhīto bhavati |
SA01n787:2626: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ |
SA01n787:2628: yaduktaṃ sutre cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ sālambanāḥ sākāraḥ sāśrayāḥ sasaṃprayogāśca |
SA01n787:2651: catvāri āryasatyāni ṣoḍaśākārāḥ tathatā sarve anityāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve duḥkhā saṃskārāḥ sarve'nātmāno dharmāḥ nirvāṇaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyamapraṇihitamanimittaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:2655: ṣoḍaśākāreṣu śūnye kati ākārāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti |
SA01n787:2667: skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyuasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:2671: yat dharmā dharmānabhiniṣyandayanti nahyeṣāṃ nirhetuko nāpi viṣamahetuka utpāda itīdaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam |
SA01n787:2674: yad adhobhūmikānāmaudarikatā ūrdhvabhūmikānāṃ śāntatā tathatā catvāryasatyāni ca |
SA01n787:2686: anādikālāt svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇasthitadharmeṣu yā dharmatāpariniṣpattiḥ sā dharmatā ||
SA01n787:2702: nāmaparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣitaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ |
SA01n787:2715: saṃbhṛtabodhisaṃbhārasya ūṣmagatādiṣu āryasatyeṣu ca yad vāhuśrutyam ||
SA01n787:2749: pāramitānāṃ saṃkhyānirddeśatāmupādāya lakṣaṇanirddeśatāmupādāya kramanirdeśatāmupādāya niruktinirdeśatāmupādāya bhāvanānirdeśatā mupādāya prabhedanirdeśatāmupādāya saṃgrahanirdeśatāmupādāya vipakṣanirdeśatāmupādaya guṇavarṇananirdeśatāmupādāya anyo'nyaviniścayatāṃ copādāya ||
SA01n787:2750: kena kāraṇena vaipulyaṃ audāryaṃ gāmbhīrya ca deśyate |
SA01n787:2756: kena kāraṇena vaipulye ekatyāḥ sattvā adhimucyante |
SA01n787:2759: idaṃ ca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye bodhisattvasya yathāruta mayoniśo dharmānvicinvataḥ aṣṭāviṃśatirasadṛṣṭaya utpadyante ||
SA01n787:2761: nimittadṛṣṭiḥ prajñaptyapavādadṛṣṭiḥ parikalpāpavādadṛṣṭiḥ tattvāpavādadṛṣṭiḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiḥ anavadyatādṛṣṭiḥ niḥsaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ avajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiḥ viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiḥ anabhyupagamadṛṣṭiḥ kusṛtidṛṣṭiḥ satkāradṛṣṭi dṛḍhamūḍhatādṛṣṭiḥ mūladṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭāvadṛṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ prayoganirākaraṇadṛṣṭiḥ anairyāṇikadṛṣṭiḥ āvaraṇopacayadṛṣṭiḥ apuṇyaprasavadṛṣṭiḥ vaiphalyadṛṣṭiḥ nigrāhyadṛṣṭiḥ abhyākhyānadṛṣṭiḥ akathyadṛṣṭiḥ mahādṛṣṭiḥ abhimānadṛṣṭiśca ||
SA01n787:2766: api khalu parikalpite svabhāve lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya paratantre utpattiniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya pariniṣpanne paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatāmupādāya ||
SA01n787:2785: tatra pañcavidhāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvattirtamiti darśayati |
SA01n787:2786: pañcavidhā bhāvanā saṃbhinnabhāvanā animittabhāvanā anābhogabhāvanā uttaptabhāvanā parivṛttinibhaḥ(?)
SA01n787:2788: kena kāraṇena vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakadharmaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhiṣṭhānatāmupādāya ||
SA01n787:2796: roga caritaprabhedataḥ niryāṇaprabhedataḥ ādhāraprabhedataḥ prayogaprabhedataḥ phalaprabhedataḥ dhātuprabhedataḥ caryāprabhedataśca ||
SA01n787:2799: rāgacaritaḥ dveṣacarita mohacaritaḥ mānacaritaḥ vitarkacaritaḥ samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaska caritaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ ||
SA01n787:2810: śraddhādhimuktaḥ dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimuktaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ strotāpattiphalapratipakṣakaḥ strotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ anāgāmī arhattvaphalapratipannakaḥ arhan saptakṛbhdavaparamaḥ kulaṃkulaḥ ekavīcikaḥ antarāparinirvāyī upapadyaparinirvāyī anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī ūrddvaṃstrotāḥ parihāṇadharmā arhan cetanādharmā arhan anurakṣaṇādharmā arhan sthitākampyaḥ arhan prativedhadharmā arhan akopyadharmā arhan ca pudgalaprabhedaḥ ||
SA01n787:2814: kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaraśca bodhisattvaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ acintyaśca tathāgataḥ pudgalaprabhedaḥ ||
SA01n787:2817: adhimukticārī bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśayacārī bodhisattvaḥ nimittacārī bodhisattvaḥ animittacāri bodhisattvaḥ anabhisaṃskāracārī bodhisattvaśca pudgalaprabhedaḥ ||
SA01n787:2820: evaṃ dveṣacarito mohacarito mānacarito vitarkacaritaśca pudgalaḥ tīvrāyataviśiṣṭaḥ ||
SA01n787:2826: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā śrāvakadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyaḥ svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ śrāvakapiṭakamavalambya vīryabhāvanayā dharmānudharmacārī duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2828: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā pratyekabuddhadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā madhyendriyaḥ svavimuktaye praṇihitaḥ vairāgyabhāvanayā vimuktāśayaḥ kevalabhāvanayā cādhigatavodhyāśayaḥ śrāvakapiṭakamavalambya vīryabhāvanayā dharmānudharmacārī anutpāditapūrvanirvedhabhāgīyaḥ utpāditapūrvanirvedhabhāgīyaḥ aprāptapūrvaphalaḥ abuddhalaukikaḥ adhyātma cetanayā ārya mārgasaṃmukhībhūtaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ ekavihārī pratyekajinaḥ varggacāri duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2830: yaḥ samāpanno vā asamāpanno vā bodhisattvadharmatāvihārī prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ sarvasattvavimokṣāya praṇihitaḥ apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇāśayaḥ bodhisattvapiṭakamavalambya vīryabhāvanayā dharmānudharmacārī sattvān paripācayati śuddhāṃ buddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati vyākaraṇaṃ ca pratilabhate samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca sākṣātkaroti ||
SA01n787:2832: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya mṛdumātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ mṛdumātrāmokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ aniyatajanmakālikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2834: satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya madhyamātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ madhyamātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgato niyatajanmakālikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2836: satyādhipatayaṃ dharmamālambya adhimātrasamutthitaḥ śuddhaśraddhādhimuktaḥ adhimātramokṣabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2837: punaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu mṛdumātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgato mṛdumātra nirvedhabhāgīyasanvāgata anivatajanmakālikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2838: saṃbhṛtāsaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu madhyamātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ madhyamātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgato nithatajanmakālikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2839: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamālambya satyeṣu adhimātrasatya dharmanidhyānakṣāntisamanvāgataḥ adhimātranirvedhabhāgīyasamanvāgataḥ tajjanmakālikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2840: tatra trimātranirvedhabhāgīyo laukikāgradharmaṃ sthāpayitvā laukikāgradharmaprakṛtyaiva kṣaṇikaḥ aprāvandhikaḥ ||
SA01n787:2844: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro mṛdvindriyaḥ paropadeśamanusmṛtya yaḥ satyābhisamayāya prayujyate ||
SA01n787:2846: saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārastīkṣṇendriyaḥ svayameva satyādhipateyaṃ dharmamanusmṛtya yaḥ [satyābhi]samayāya prayujyate ||
SA01n787:2867: yadā darśana prahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt [stota ā]panno bhavati ||
SA01n787:2868: kena kāraṇena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt strotaāpanno bhavati |
SA01n787:2875: api khalu jñeyavipra[tipatti]kāraṇatāmupādāya dṛṣṭivipratipattikāraṇatāmupādāya pratipakṣavipratipattikāraṇatāṃ copādāya ||
SA01n787:2877: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ pañcaprakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ |
SA01n787:2879: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarasya ṣaṣṭhasya kleśaprakā [rasya pra] hāṇamārge yaḥ pugdalaḥ ||
SA01n787:2881: bhāvanāmārge kāmāvacarāṇāṃ saptamāṣṭamānāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ ||
SA01n787:2883: bhāvanāmarge kāmāvacarasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ ||
SA01n787:2884: yadā sarveṣāṃ kāmāvacarā[ṇāṃ bhāva]nāprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇādanāgāmī bhavati ||
SA01n787:2892: bhāvāmrikasya navamasya kleśaprakārasya prahāṇamārge yaḥ pudgalaḥ ||
SA01n787:2893: yadā traidhātukānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarvvakleśānāṃ prahāṇādarhan bhavati ||
SA01n787:2900: strotaāpanna eva pudgalaḥ saptakṛtvo'pi miśromiśra devamanuṣyeṣu bhavāt saṃsṛtya yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2902: deveṣu vā kulātkulaṃ gatvā [manuṣye]ṣu vā yo duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2906: upapattisaṃyojane prahīṇe abhinivṛttisaṃyojane aprahīṇe antarābhavamabhinirvarttayanneva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti abhinivṛtto vā antarābhave upapattibhavagamanāya cetayannevayo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti |
SA01n787:2907: abhisaṃcetayitvā vā upapattibhavamabhisaṃprasthitaḥ[bhavānu]papatticchandaṃ yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2909: ubhayasaṃyojane aprahīṇe rūpadhātāvupapannamātra eva yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2911: upapannaḥ anabhisaṃskāreṇa yo mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti ||
SA01n787:2915: upapanno rūpāvacarāṇāṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvadakaniṣṭhagān praviśya tannānāsrava mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti |
SA01n787:2916: puna kaścid yāvad bhavāgragān mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya duḥkhasyāntamanuprāpnoti |
SA01n787:2917: api ca vyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya pañcaprakārā prabhedāḥ |
SA01n787:2919: taiḥ vyavakīrṇābhāvitasya caturthadhyānasya pañcaprabhedaiḥ yathākramaṃ paścasu śuddhāvāseṣūpapattiḥ ||
SA01n787:2921: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā cetayitvā vā acetayitvā vā dṛṣṭadharmasukha vihārāt parihāṇameti ||
SA01n787:2923: mṛdvindriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā acetayitvā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti cetayitvā na parihāṇameti ||
SA01n787:2928: mṛdvindriya prakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt na parihāṇameti nāpi indriyāṇyuttāpayati ||
SA01n787:2930: mṛdvindriyāprakṛtiko vikṣipto vā avikṣipto vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhaviharāt na parihāṇameti kevala mindriyā ṇyuttāpayati ||
SA01n787:2932: tīkṣṇendriyaprakṛtiko vikṣipto va avikṣipto vā na dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāt parihāṇameti ||
SA01n787:2936: kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati adharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ |
SA01n787:2938: kāmāvacaro'śaikṣaḥ ka... kāmādhātāvupapanno bhavati āryadharmaṃ ca prāptaḥ pudgalaḥ |
SA01n787:2940: yathā kāmāvacarāstrayaḥ tathā rūpāvacarā ārupyavacara....... kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro bodhisattvaḥ katamaḥ |
SA01n787:2941: ārūpyadhātu vyavakarṣitena ..... saṃprayukto dhyānasukhairviharatīti kāmadhātāvapyupapanno rūpadhātāvapyupapannaḥ pudgala kāmāvacaraḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ katamaḥ |
SA01n787:2944: kāmadhātau tuṣitabhavanayāsamārabhya yāvat mahāparinirvāṇaṃ darśayati sarvāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ buddhacaryāṃ mahācaryāṃ darśayatīti pudgalaḥ |
SA01n787:2954: acalā sādhumatīdharmameghāsu bhūmiṣu sthito yo bodhisattvaḥ ||
SA01n787:2955: punaḥ khalu strotaāpannaḥ pugdalo yaduktaḥ sa dvividhaḥ |
SA01n787:2958: sakṛnnairyāṇikaḥ satyābhisamayamabhisaṃpraviṣṭaḥ aprāpta samāpattimāśritya adhigatena lokottaramāgreṇa sakṛta traidhātukāvacarān sarvakleśān prajahāti prakāraśaḥ prajahāti |
SA01n787:2960: sa ca pudgalo bhūyo dṛṣṭe dharme maraṇakāle ājñāmārāgayati |
SA01n787:2966: dharmābhisamayaḥ arthābhisamayaḥ tattvābhisamayaḥ pṛṣṭhābhisamayaḥ ratnābhisamayaḥ asamudācārābhisamayaḥ niṣṭhābhisamayaḥ śrāvakābhisamayaḥ pratyekabuddhābhisamayaḥ bodhisattvābhisamayaśca ||
SA01n787:2968: satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrasya adhimuktiprasādasya pratilambhaḥ yathāsaṃpratyayaṃ caryā ca ||
SA01n787:2969: arthābhisamayaḥ katamaḥ satyādhipateyeṣu dharmeṣu adhimātrāyāḥ satyeṣu dhamanidhyānakṣānteḥ pratilambhaḥ |
SA01n787:2976: bhāvanāmārge tatsaṃvṛtijñānāni pratilabhate na tu saṃmukhīkaroti |
SA01n787:2981: buddhe'vetya prasādaḥ dharme'tya prasādaḥ saṃghe'vetya prasādaḥ ||
SA01n787:2983: akāraṇasaṃvaralābhāt śikṣāgatasya yadātmano narakakṣayaṃ tiryagyonikṣayaḥ pretayonikṣayaḥ avāṅpatanadurgatikṣayaḥ iti |
SA01n787:2989: śrāvakāṇāṃ parato ghoṣamāgamya pratilambhataḥ śrāvakābhisamaya ityucyate ||
SA01n787:2994: pūrvokteṣu saptābhisamayeṣu yā samudāgamakṣāntiḥ no tu sakṣātkiryā |
SA01n787:2999: ālambanaviśeṣaḥ upastambhaviśeṣaḥ prativedhaviśeṣaḥ abhyupagamaviśeṣaḥ niryāṇaviśeṣaḥ parigrahaviśeṣaḥ vyavasthānaviśeṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāparivāraviśeṣaḥ abhijanmaviśeṣaḥ janmaviśeṣaḥ phalaviśeṣaśca |
SA01n787:3001: āśrayaparivṛttiviśeṣataḥ guṇasamṛddhiviśeṣataḥ pañcākāraviśeṣataḥ trikāyaviśeṣataḥ nirvāṇaviśeṣataḥ miśropamiśrajñānaśaktilābhaviśeṣataḥ āvaraṇaviśuddhiviśeṣataḥ miśropamiśrakarmakriyāviśeṣataḥ abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasandarśanopāyaviśeṣataḥ pañcākāraparitrāṇaviśeṣataśca veditavyaḥ ||
SA01n787:3005: apramāṇāni vimokṣāḥ abhibhvāyatanāni kṛtsāyatanāni araṇāpraṇīdhijñānam pratisaṃvidaḥ abhijñā lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni pariśuddhayaḥ valāni vaiśāradyāni smṛtyupasthānāni arakṣāṇi asaṃpramoṣadharmatā vāsanāsamuddhātaḥ mahākaruṇā āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā ityevamādayo guṇā yathā sūtrāntareṣu nirdiṣṭāḥ ||
SA01n787:3009: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena saṃprayujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3011: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā duḥkhena viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3013: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvāḥ sukhena na viyujyeranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3015: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvā hita labheranniti vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3019: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā avibhāvānād draṣṭarī rūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanād vā dṛśya rūpādi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddho samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ yāvad nirmāṇāvaraṇād vimuktiḥ ||
SA01n787:3021: dhyānaṃ niśritya draṣṭari rūpasaṃjñāyā vibhāvanād arūpasaṃjñāyāḥ saṃniveśanādvā dṛśya rūpāṇi paśyatīti vihārasamṛddhau samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3022: kathaṃ śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharatīti |
SA01n787:3023: dhyānaṃ niśritya adhyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣu anyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāyā anyonyānugamasaṃjñāyā anyonyaikarasasaṃjñāyāśca labhāt tatra labdhe vihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat yāvat śubhaśubhanirmāṇāt saṃkleśotpattyāvaraṇācca vimuktiḥ ||
SA01n787:3025: vimokṣānukūlā kāśānantyāyatanavimokṣaḥ tathā vijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanavimokṣā api draṣṭavyaḥ yāvat vimokṣaḥ śānto vimokṣaḥ asaktyāvaraṇaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:3027: naivasaṃjñānasaṃjñāyatanavimokṣaṃ niśritya samatikrāntānāṃ śiṣṭe śānte vimokṣe mokṣānusadṛśo vihāraḥ vihārasamṛddau ca cittacaitasikānāṃ nirodhaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhāvaraṇād vimuktyartham ||
SA01n787:3030: pūrvāṇī catvāri abhibhvāyatanāni dvābhyāṃ vimokṣābhyāṃ vyavasthāpyante |
SA01n787:3031: uttarāṇi catvāri abhibhvāvatanāni ekena vimokṣeṇa vyavasthāpyante |
SA01n787:3042: kṛtsnaspharaṇavihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ kṛtsnāyatanānītyucyante ||
SA01n787:3048: dhyānaṃ niśritya kleśotpattyanurakṣāvihārasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3050: dhyānaṃ niśritya jñeya jñānapraṇidhisamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3054: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvadharma paryāyeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhīḥ prajñāśeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3056: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇe abhiprāye cāvyāghātasamṛddau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3058: dhyānaṃ niśritya janapadabhāpāyāmanuvyavahāre dharmanirvacane ca avyāghāta samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3060: dhyānaṃ niśritya dharmaprabhedeṣu avyāghātasamṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3064: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrarddhivikurvita samṛddhau samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3066: dhyānaṃ niśritya vicitrāṇāṃ śabdānāmanuśravasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3068: dhyānaṃ niśritya parasattveṣu cittacaritaparyāya praveśasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3070: dhyānaṃ niśritya pūrvāntacaryānusmaraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3072: dhyānaṃ niśritya sattvānāṃ cyutyupapādaprakāra saṃdarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3074: dhyānaṃ niśritya āsravakṣayajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3076: dhyānaṃ niśritya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairvibhrājamānasandarśanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayūktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ tatsamutthitavipākāśca ||
SA01n787:3080: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamaśrayasyopādāne sthānaparityāgānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhīḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3082: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmamālambananirmāṇapariṇāmanajñānānāṃ samṛddhau yaḥ samādhi prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3084: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ samādhimukhavaśavarttisamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3086: dhyānaṃ niśritya yathākāmaṃ dhāraṇīmukhasandhāraṇasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3089: sthānāsthānabalaṃ katamat dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra sthānāsthānajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3091: dhyānaṃ niśritya sarvaprakāra karmasvakajñānasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3096: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārajñeyābhisaṃbodhipratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3098: dhyānaṃ niśritya svārthamevārabhya sarvākārasravakṣayapratijñā pratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3100: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākārāntarāyikadharmapratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3102: dhyānaṃ niśritya parārthamārabhya sarvākāra nairyāṇikamārgadharma pratijñāpratiṣṭhāpanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3105: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe sarvākārasaṃkleśāsamudācārasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ purvavat ||
SA01n787:3108: gaṇaparikarṣaṇe yathākāmamavavādānuśāsanīprayogasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3110: sarvākārasya yathāvat kṛtassa bhāṣitasya cābhilapanasamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3112: sarvajñasya sataḥ asarvajñaceṣṭitāsamudācārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3114: nirantaraṃ sarvaprakāraduḥkhālambanakaruṇāvihārasamṛddau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3117: asādhāraṇa kāyavāṅganaskarthapariśuddhi samṛddau sāśrayāṇāṃ saphalānāṃ tathāgatendriyāṇamaprāptyāmaparihāṇisamṛddhau asādhāraṇa karmasamudācārasamṛddhau asādhāraṇajñānavihārasamṛddhau ca yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
SA01n787:3119: skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ sarvākārajñatāsamṛddhau yaḥ samādhiḥ prajñā tatsaṃprayuktāśca cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ ||
SA01n787:3121: viśuddhāni catvāri dhyānāni niśritya anyatīrthīyaḥ śrāvako bodhisattvo vā abhinirharati catvāri apramāṇānyevaṃ pañcābhijñāḥ |
SA01n787:3122: śeṣān guṇān prāntakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya śrāvako bodhisattvastathāgato vā'bhinirharati ||
SA01n787:3127: ye svakāritrapratyupasthānāḥ te lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhāḥ saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvā draṣṭavyāḥ ||
SA01n787:3131: anukampāvihāritayā puṇya saṃbhāraṃ paripūrayati sattvaparipāke ca na parikhidyate ||
SA01n787:3134: śubhanirmāṇe na saṃkliśyate śānteṣu vimokṣeṣu na sajjati |

SA01n787:3154: ākāṅkṣayankalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā tiṣṭhati āyuḥsaṃskārān vā utsṛjati |
SA01n787:3155: dharmavaśavarttī bhavati samādhivaśavartī saddharmaṃ ca sandhārayati ||
SA01n787:3157: ahetuviṣamahetuvādaṃ pratyākhāyākṛtābhyāgamavāde ca samyaga bhyudayamārgaṃ deśayati sattvacittacaritāni cānupraviśya deśanābhājanatāṃ cāśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ cālambanaṃ ca saṃbhāraṃ ca bhavyatāṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathāvanniḥśreyasamārgaṃ deśayati |
SA01n787:3158: sarvamārāṃśca nigṛṇhāti sarvatra ca praśnaṃ pṛcchati pṛṣṭo vyākaroti ||
SA01n787:3169: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhān kāyavāṅmanaskarmapariśuddhyā prāptyā cāreṇa vihāreṇa vā'bhibhavati ||
SA01n787:3171: sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasaṃśayāṃ śchinatti dharmanetrīñca dīrghakālamavasthāpayati yena paripakṣā (? kṣyāḥ)
SA01n787:3173: eṣvabhisamayeṣūttarottaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ labhamānaḥ pūrvakaṃ hīnaṃ mārgaṃ vijahāti saṃkalanaprahāṇaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti |
SA01n787:3174: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau śrāvakaḥ sarvammārgasamavasargavihānyā vijahāti no tu bodhisattvaḥ ||
SA01n787:3181: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvo bodhimanava vadyāmavakrāntaḥ strotāpanno na bhavati |
SA01n787:3187: bodhisattvaḥ satyānyabhi samayena labdhvā daśasu mūmiṣu bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgaṃ bhāvayati na kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣamārgam ||
SA01n787:3188: tathā ca bodhiprāptaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca vijahāti arhan tathāgataśca saṃpadyate ||
SA01n787:3189: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvakleśāprahāṇāt mantroṣadhayo viṣamiva sarvakleśān abhibhavati sarvān kleśān doṣāṃśca notpādayati sarvāsu bhūmiṣu arhanniva kleśān prajahāti |
SA01n787:3190: api khalu bodhisattvo jñeyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati upāyeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati abhūtaparikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati nirvikalpeṣu bhāvanākuśalo bhavati tena kālena kālamindriyāṇyuttāpayati |
SA01n787:3193: bhrāntiḥ bhrāntyāśrayaḥ abhrāntyāśrayaḥ bhrāntyabhrāntiḥ abhrāntiḥ abhrāntiniṣyandaśca ||
SA01n787:3199: mūlavikalpaḥ nimittivikalpaḥ nimittapratibhāsavikalpaḥ nimittavikāravikalpaḥ nimittipratibhāsavikāravikalpaḥ paropanītavikalpaḥ ayoniśovikalpaḥ yoniśovikalpaḥ abhiniveśavikalpaḥ vikṣepavikalpaśca ||
SA01n787:3201: abhāvavikalpa bhāvavikalpaḥ samāropavikalpaḥ apavādavikalpaḥ ekatvavi kalpaḥ pṛthaktvavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpaḥ viśeṣavikalpaḥ yathānāmārthavikalpaḥ yathārthanāmavikalpaśca ||
SA01n787:3206: yā'sau nimittato niṣprapañcanirvikalpatā tasyāḥ punaḥ abhāvasya pañca nimittāni |
SA01n787:3207: na amanasikārataḥ na manasikārasamatikramataḥ na vyupaśamataḥ na svabhāvataḥ na ālambane'bhisaṃskārataśca |
SA01n787:3209: bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ indriyāpyuttāpayatīti |
SA01n787:3216: arthaviniścayaḥ vyākhyāviniścayaḥ prabhidyasaṃdarśanaviniścayaḥ saṃpraśnaviniścayaḥ saṃgrahaviniścayaḥ vādaviniścayaḥ abhisandhiviniścayaśca ||
SA01n787:3220: svabhāvārthaḥ hetvarthaḥ phalārthaḥ karmārthaḥ yogārthaḥ vṛttyarthaśca ||
SA01n787:3225: vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ adhipatiphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:3227: upalabdhikarma kāritrakarma vyāvasāyakarma pariṇatikarma prāptikarma ca ||
SA01n787:3229: sāmūhiko yogaḥ ānubandhiko yogaḥ sāṃbandhiko yogaḥ āvasthiko yogaḥ vaikāriko yogaśca ||
SA01n787:3236: parijñeyavastu parijñeyo'rthaḥ parijñopaniṣad parijñā parijñāphalam tatpravedanā ca ||
SA01n787:3239: vyākhyāsaṃgrahamukham vastusaṃgrahamukham aṅgopāṅgamukham uggarottaranirhāramukham pratikṣepamukham akṣarapariṇāmamukham nāśānāśamukham pudgalavyavasthānamukham prabhedavyavasthānamukham nayamukham parijñādimukham balā balamukham pratyāhāramukham abhinirhāramukhaṃ ca ||
SA01n787:3241: yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacarakaḥ pūrvapadakaḥ paścātpadakaḥ dvikoṭikaḥ trikoṭikaḥ catuṣkoṭikaḥ oṃkāritaḥ prātikṣepika ityevamādayaḥ ||
SA01n787:3243: aṣṭākārakāyadeśena aṣṭākārayāyadeśane ca praśnavyākaraṇena sarvasatyamithyā viniścayaḥ |
SA01n787:3249: kṛtyānuṣṭhānaviniścayasthānam avatāraviniścayasthānam adhimuktiviniścayasthānam yuktiviniścayasthānam sāṃkathyaviniścayasthānam prativedhaviniścayasthānam viśuddhiviniścayasthānam abhinirhārapadaprabhedaviniścayasthānam anābhogābhogamātrasarvārthasiddhiviniścayasthānaṃ ca |
SA01n787:3252: vādaḥ vādādhikaraṇaṃ vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ bādālaṃkāraḥ vādanigrahaḥ vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ bāde bahukarā dharmāśca ||
SA01n787:3254: vādaḥ pravādaḥ vivādaḥ apavādaḥ anuvāda avavāśca ||
SA01n787:3261: avavādaḥ sattvānāṃ asamāhitacittānāṃ cittasamādhānāya samāhitacittānāṃ vimokṣalābhāya deśanāvādaḥ ||
SA01n787:3262: dvitīyaṃ vādādhikaraṇaṃ rājakulaṃ vā prajākulaṃ vā prāmāṇikānāṃ sahāyakānāṃ dharmārthakuśalānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ nādasabhā vā |
SA01n787:3269: pratijñā hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ anumānaṃ āptāgamaśca ||
SA01n787:3273: hetuḥ tasminneva sādhye apratītasyārthasya saṃpratyayanimittaṃ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhasamākhyānam ||
SA01n787:3274: dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa antena adṛṣṭāsya antasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam ||
SA01n787:3280: caturtho vādālaṃkāraḥ vādādhiṣṭhāne samyagyuktibhiḥ vādasabhāyāṃ gambhīro nipuṇaśca bhavatīti vādālaṃkāra ityucyate |
